```{r}
gmailAddress <- c(
  "tim@gmail.com",
  "anita",
  "yellen@gmail.com",
  "huang@gmail.com"
)
```
```{r}
##sequence source
##body
##for loop
library(stringr)
for (i in seq_along(gmailAddress)) {
  if(str_detect(gmailAddress[i],"@gmail.com")){
    print(gmailAddress[i])
  }else{
    print(str_c(gmailAddress[i],"@gmail.com"))
  }
}
```
```{r}
str_detect(gmailAddress,"@gmail.com", )
```
